input.code:
// Load dataset from the CoNLL-2000 Chunking Shared Task
val train = CoNLL2000.train.take(2).toSeq
val labels = train.flatMap(_._2).distinct
val words = train.flatMap(_._1).distinct
words.take(5)
input.outputFormat:
List
  1. Confidence
  2. in
  3. the
  4. pound
  5. is

input.code:
// Define the domain of inputs, outputs and parameters
val maxLength = train.map(_._2.length).max
implicit val Inputs = Seqs(words.toDom withOOV "[OOV]", 0, maxLength)
implicit val Outputs = Seqs(labels.toDom, 0, maxLength)
implicit val Instances = Pairs(Inputs, Outputs)
implicit val Thetas = Vectors(dim = 20000)

input.outputFormat:
MaxProductParameters
  • iterations 1

extraFields.aggregatedCells:
["// Load dataset from the CoNLL-2000 Chunking Shared Task
val train = CoNLL2000.train.take(2).toSeq
val labels = train.flatMap(_._2).distinct
val words = train.flatMap(_._1).distinct
words.take(5)","// Define the domain of inputs, outputs and parameters
val maxLength = train.map(_._2.length).max
implicit val Inputs = Seqs(words.toDom withOOV "[OOV]", 0, maxLength)
implicit val Outputs = Seqs(labels.toDom, 0, maxLength)
implicit val Instances = Pairs(Inputs, Outputs)
implicit val Thetas = Vectors(dim = 20000)","// Define the model
implicit val index = new SimpleIndex()
implicit val maxProductParams = MaxProductParameters(iterations = 1)

def biasTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) =
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('bias, y(i)))
    
def wordTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('word, x(i), y(i)))
    
def pairTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length - 1)(i => t dot feature('pair, y(i), y(i+1)))
    
def model(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct"]

["// Load dataset from the CoNLL-2000 Chunking Shared Task
val train = CoNLL2000.train.take(2).toSeq
val labels = train.flatMap(_._2).distinct
val words = train.flatMap(_._1).distinct
words.take(5)","// Define the domain of inputs, outputs and parameters
val maxLength = train.map(_._2.length).max
implicit val Inputs = Seqs(words.toDom withOOV "[OOV]", 0, maxLength)
implicit val Outputs = Seqs(labels.toDom, 0, maxLength)
implicit val Instances = Pairs(Inputs, Outputs)
implicit val Thetas = Vectors(dim = 20000)","// Define the model
implicit val index = new SimpleIndex()
implicit val maxProductParams = MaxProductParameters(iterations = 1)

def biasTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) =
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('bias, y(i)))
    
def wordTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('word, x(i), y(i)))
    
def pairTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length - 1)(i => t dot feature('pair, y(i), y(i+1)))
    
def model(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct","// Learn the parameters with AdaGrad
implicit val adagradPparams = AdaGradParameters(epochs = 1, learningRate = 0.1)

val thetaStar = learn(Thetas){ t =>
    perceptron(train.toConst)(Outputs)(model(t))
} using adaGrad"]

input.outputFormat: Vector(O, B-PP, B-NP, B-PP)

input.code:
// The factor graph used in inference
result.factorGraphs.head

extraFields.aggregatedCells:
["// Load dataset from the CoNLL-2000 Chunking Shared Task
val train = CoNLL2000.train.take(2).toSeq
val labels = train.flatMap(_._2).distinct
val words = train.flatMap(_._1).distinct
words.take(5)","// Define the domain of inputs, outputs and parameters
val maxLength = train.map(_._2.length).max
implicit val Inputs = Seqs(words.toDom withOOV "[OOV]", 0, maxLength)
implicit val Outputs = Seqs(labels.toDom, 0, maxLength)
implicit val Instances = Pairs(Inputs, Outputs)
implicit val Thetas = Vectors(dim = 20000)","// Define the model
implicit val index = new SimpleIndex()
implicit val maxProductParams = MaxProductParameters(iterations = 1)

def biasTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) =
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('bias, y(i)))
    
def wordTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('word, x(i), y(i)))
    
def pairTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length - 1)(i => t dot feature('pair, y(i), y(i+1)))
    
def model(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct","// Learn the parameters with AdaGrad
implicit val adagradPparams = AdaGradParameters(epochs = 1, learningRate = 0.1)

val thetaStar = learn(Thetas){ t =>
    perceptron(train.toConst)(Outputs)(model(t))
} using adaGrad","// Predict the labels for an unseen test example
def predict(x:Inputs.Value) = argmax(Outputs){
    model(thetaStar.toConst)(Inputs.Const(x))
}
val test = IndexedSeq("This", "is", "a", "test")
val result = predict(test).evalResult()"]

def wordTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) =

def model(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct","// Learn the parameters with AdaGrad

val thetaStar = learn(Thetas){ t =>

extraFields.aggregatedCells:
["// Load dataset from the CoNLL-2000 Chunking Shared Task
val train = CoNLL2000.train.take(2).toSeq
val labels = train.flatMap(_._2).distinct
val words = train.flatMap(_._1).distinct
words.take(5)","// Define the domain of inputs, outputs and parameters
val maxLength = train.map(_._2.length).max
implicit val Inputs = Seqs(words.toDom withOOV "[OOV]", 0, maxLength)
implicit val Outputs = Seqs(labels.toDom, 0, maxLength)
implicit val Instances = Pairs(Inputs, Outputs)
implicit val Thetas = Vectors(dim = 20000)","// Define the model
implicit val index = new SimpleIndex()
implicit val maxProductParams = MaxProductParameters(iterations = 1)

def biasTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) =
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('bias, y(i)))
    
def wordTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length)(i => t dot feature('word, x(i), y(i)))
    
def pairTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length - 1)(i => t dot feature('pair, y(i), y(i+1)))
    
def model(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct","// Learn the parameters with AdaGrad
implicit val adagradPparams = AdaGradParameters(epochs = 1, learningRate = 0.1)

val thetaStar = learn(Thetas){ t =>
    perceptron(train.toConst)(Outputs)(model(t))
} using adaGrad","// Predict the labels for an unseen test example
def predict(x:Inputs.Value) = argmax(Outputs){
    model(thetaStar.toConst)(Inputs.Const(x))
}
val test = IndexedSeq("This", "is", "a", "test")
val result = predict(test).evalResult()","// The factor graph used in inference
result.factorGraphs.head","//Add skip-chain features to the model
def skipTerms(t: Thetas.Term)(x:Inputs.Term, y: Outputs.Term) = 
    sum(0 until x.length - 2)(i => t dot feature('skip, y(i), y(i+2)))

def newModel(t: Thetas.Term)(x: Inputs.Term)(y: Outputs.Term) = {
    biasTerms(t)(x, y) + wordTerms(t)(x, y) + pairTerms(t)(x, y) + skipTerms(t)(x, y)
} subjectTo (y.length === x.length) argmaxBy maxProduct

val newTheta = learn(Thetas){ t => 
    perceptron(train.toConst)(Outputs)(newModel(t))
} using adaGrad

val newResult = argmax(Outputs){ newModel(thetaStar.toConst)(Inputs.Const(test))}.evalResult()
"]
